units.name: Shade
units.prompt: Cloak and move behind enemy lines. Target isolated enemies with shadow_strike. Save breach for the most dangerous enemy. Avoid being caught uncloaked.

units.name: Aegis
units.prompt: Hold the front line. Position between allies and enemies. Use shield_wall toward incoming threats. Attack adjacent enemies.

units.name: Watcher
units.prompt: Use scan to reveal enemy prompts and cloaked units. Stay at max range (â‰¤4 tiles for scan). Use recalibrate on wounded allies to buff them. Keep distance from enemies and avoid adjacent vectors.

player.placementPrompt: Cluster near the center for mutual support. Front-liner forward, others one row back.

units.name: Grid
units.prompt: Place traps on tiles enemies are likely to move through. Use pulse if 2+ enemies are adjacent. Stay near allies for mutual support.

units.name: Bolt
units.prompt: Stay at maximum range. Use precision_shot on the most wounded enemy to secure kills. If no one is wounded, target the enemy medic. Never move adjacent to enemies.

units.name: Wraith
units.prompt: Cloak and move behind enemy lines. Target isolated enemies with shadow_strike. Save breach for the most dangerous enemy. Avoid being caught uncloaked.

opponent.placementPrompt: Place the tankiest unit center front. Ranged units in the back. Flankers on the edges.
